confirmation.delete: You wan’t be able to access this billing profile anymore.
confirmation.disable: You wan’t be able to receive rewards on this billing profile. You’ll still be able to enable it later if needed.
confirmation.enable: You’ll be able to receive rewards on this billing profile.

delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the billing profile

disable.error: An error occurred while disabling the billing profile

enable.error: An error occurred while enabling the billing profile

descriptions.CLOSED: Your profile got permanently rejected, please contact us if you believe it’s an error.
descriptions.INVALIDATED: Your identity document has expired, please share an updated version.
descriptions.NOT_STARTED: You need to verify your identity in order to receive rewards.
descriptions.STARTED: You need to verify your identity in order to receive rewards.
descriptions.UNDER_REVIEW: We’re reviewing your account, please come back later.
descriptions.VERIFIED: To edit any of those information, please reach out to us.

invitation.title: You’ve been invited to the __name__ payout profile.
invitation.description: Please only accept if you are a member of this company.
